review: It's awesome; great to have on any TV that's not already connected. I like it better than my apple TV too.

review: I absolutely love this product and all that it allows me to do.  However, it does seem to have one glitch that I'm not sure what's causing it.  Every so often I will go into use it and it will tell me I've lost my internet connection, but won't actually let me reconnect. I've found that if I unplug the device from power, not just the TV, and then plug it back in everything is fin.  I think it's just one of the bugs from buying at the initial release.  I would think newer versions would be less likely to have this issue.
author: Nicole Largo
